code: /* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-comment-textnodes */import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./../Page.css";import{IonButton,IonCard,IonCardHeader,IonCardSubtitle,IonCardTitle,IonIcon,IonItem,IonLabel,IonList,IonListHeader,IonLoading,IonNavLink,IonRefresher,IonRefresherContent,IonThumbnail}from"@ionic/react";import{IonButtons,IonContent,IonHeader,IonMenuButton,IonTitle,IonToolbar}from"@ionic/react";import{add,chevronForward,cloudDownload}from"ionicons/icons";import{searchProductData}from"./ProductApi";import ProductEdit from"./ProductEdit";import ProductAdd from"./ProductAdd";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const[productData,setProductData]=useState([]);const[showLoading,setShowLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{searchProducts();},[]);const searchProducts=async()=>{setShowLoading(true);let list=await searchProductData();setTimeout(()=>{setProductData(list);setShowLoading(false);},1000);};const reload=async()=>{localStorage.removeItem("products");await searchProducts();};function handleRefresh(event){setTimeout(()=>{searchProducts();event.detail.complete();},2000);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonToolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonButtons,{slot:"start",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonMenuButton,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonTitle,{children:"Productos"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonContent,{fullscreen:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonLoading,{isOpen:showLoading,onDidDismiss:()=>setShowLoading(false),message:'Cargando datos. Espere por favor...'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonRefresher,{slot:"fixed",onIonRefresh:handleRefresh,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonRefresherContent,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonCard,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonTitle,{children:"Gesti\xF3n de los productos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonNavLink,{routerDirection:"forward",component:()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductAdd,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonButton,{color:"success",fill:"solid",slot:"end",size:"small",children:["Agregar producto",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonIcon,{icon:add})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonButton,{color:"secondary",onClick:reload,fill:"clear",slot:"end",size:"small",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonIcon,{icon:cloudDownload})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonList,{inset:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonListHeader,{color:"primary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonLabel,{children:"Listado de Productos"})}),productData.map((product,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonThumbnail,{slot:"start",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:product.Nombre,src:"https://ionicframework.com/docs/img/demos/thumbnail.svg"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonCardHeader,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonCardTitle,{children:product.Nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonCardSubtitle,{children:product.SKU})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonNavLink,{slot:"end",routerDirection:"forward",component:()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductEdit,{item:product}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonButton,{shape:"round",size:"small",fill:"outline",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonIcon,{icon:chevronForward})})})]},index);})]})]})]})]});};export default ProductList;
